name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Memberful subscriptions activated
description: Every time a new subscription is activated in your Memberful, Make will automatically add a Google Sheets row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Z00W95GxHFJIKmHxI5NahaYItzzO3Rzw8ET71jIW3zc/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
